flavorText: A symbol of ferocity in oppressive times.

foreignData.flavorText: Ein Symbol des Aufbegehrens in Zeiten der Unterdrückung.
foreignData.name: Stab des Wildmagus
foreignData.text: Immer wenn du einen grünen Zauberspruch wirkst oder ein Wald unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: Un símbolo de ferocidad en tiempos opresivos.
foreignData.name: Bastón del mago salvaje
foreignData.text: Siempre que lances un hechizo verde o un bosque entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, ganas 1 vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Un symbole de férocité en des temps d'oppression.
foreignData.name: Bâton du magus sauvage
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort vert ou qu'une forêt arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, vous gagnez 1 point de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Un simbolo di ferocia in tempi di oppressione.
foreignData.name: Bastone del Magus Selvaggio
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia verde o una Foresta entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, guadagni 1 punto vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 抑圧の時代の獰猛さの象徴。
foreignData.name: 野生の大魔術師の杖
foreignData.text: あなたが緑の呪文を１つ唱えるか森が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたは１点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 이 지팡이는 탄압의 시대의 흉포함을 상징한다.
foreignData.name: 야성마도사의 지팡이
foreignData.text: 당신이 녹색 주문을 발동하거나 숲이 당신의 조종 하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Um símbolo de ferocidade em tempos de opressão.
foreignData.name: Cajado do Magus da Natureza
foreignData.text: Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica verde ou uma Floresta entra no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, você ganha 1 ponto de vida.

foreignData.name: Посох Волхва Природы
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете зеленое заклинание или Лес выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, вы получаете 1 жизнь.

foreignData.flavorText: 在压迫的时代中象征着凶猛。
foreignData.name: 原野法师杖
foreignData.text: 每当你施放绿色咒语或每当一个树林在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

foreignData.flavorText: 在壓迫的時代中象徵著兇猛。
foreignData.name: 原野法師杖
foreignData.text: 每當你施放綠色咒語或每當一個樹林在你的操控下進戰場時，你獲得1點生命。

name: Staff of the Wild Magus
originalText: Whenever you cast a green spell or a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: Each of these artifacts cares about any land with the appropriate basic land type. For example, Staff of the Sun Magus’s ability triggers when any land with the subtype Plains enters the battlefield under your control, not just lands named Plains.

Most nonbasic lands don’t have basic land types, even if they produce colored mana. For example, Caves of Koilos is neither a Plains nor a Swamp. Having one enter the battlefield under your control won’t cause Staff of the Sun Magus’s ability to trigger.
If you cast a copy of a card that’s a certain color, the appropriate Staff’s ability will trigger. However, if you copy a spell on the stack without casting that copy, it will not.

text: Whenever you cast a green spell or a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
